title: Lae'zel
tags: where to find laezel in bg3

content:
resting at the campsite, while Lae'zel tries to kill you. State you want to torture Liam Every instance of Successful Torture on Liam, repeatable. When speaking to Minthara and her talking about the prisoner (Liam), say you can be very persuasive

Camp Celebration (Siding with the Tieflings and Druids)

If you have enough relationship (medium approval) with a Companion, in this event they will proposition you with a night together. Saying yes to it will give you an approval from them. NOTE: you
